channel.title: Svn on LuyangのBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Svn on LuyangのBlog

item.title: ubuntu 搭建 svn 服务器
item.description: 安装 subversion sudo apt-get remove --purge subversion sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install subversion 创建 SVN 用户 sudo adduser svn sudo adduser svn sudo sudo su svn 创建仓库目录 sudo mkdir /svn sudo mkdir /svn/repos sudo mkdir /svn/repos/public sudo chmod 777 -R /svn/repos/public sudo chown svn:svn -R /svn 创建版本库 sudo svnadmin create /svn/repos/public $ ls -lah /svn/repos/public total 32K
